title: Beautiful Place To Get Lost
content:
The main text looks like Trade Gothic to me, what do you think? I'm not sure.

But, most importantly, how about 'Let's' and 'Lost'?

The image is from: [http://www.20x200.com/art/2009/05/untitled-lets-get-lost.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020190100/http:/www.20x200.com/art/2009/05/untitled-lets-get-lost.html "http://www.20x200.com/art/2009/05/untitled-lets-get-lost.html")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1329\_artworkimage.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020190100/http:/typophile.com/files/1329_artworkimage.jpg) | 205.14 KB |
author: BenC

comments.content:
Yer, I think Trade Gothic is correct for the sans.  
Can’t find an exact match for the script, tho.

That script is the "Spoleto/Aktuelle/Athletic Script/Sport Script" thing that keeps coming up here. Just search on Spoleto.

- Mike Yanega
